org.apache.flink.batch.neo4j

Class Neo4JInputFormat<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<T,org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.batch.neo4j.Neo4JInputFormat<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InputFormat<T,org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplit>, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.NonParallelInput, org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplitSource<org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplit>

    public class Neo4JInputFormat<T>
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<T,org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplit>
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.io.NonParallelInput
    InputFormat to read data from Neo4J and generate item of type T from object of type Record.
    Author:
    Alberto De Lazzari
    See Also:
    Record, Serialized Form

        The default constructor
        Parameters:
        mappingStrategy - a mapping strategy that will be used to map batch data from Neo4J
        config - the connection configurations for Neo4J

      • openInputFormat

        public void openInputFormat()
        This method override the super method. It creates a Neo4JDriverWrapper and a Session that will be used to run cypher queries
